name: TheFullerMinute
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to weekly short audio snippets from Prof. Steve Fuller, Auguste Comte Chair in Social Epistemology at The
Department of Sociology, The University of Warwick.

More on Steve Fuller, please visit: https://warwick.ac.uk/fac/soc/sociology/staff/sfuller/
